name: Oppenheimer's curse demo
description: This is my first proper game that I am making and would love it if you guys could test out my demo and see if it's worth continuing. It's a post-apocalyptic game where the test of the first nuclear bomb went wrong and mutated insects and eliminated most of the population but I am currently working on adding people that you can encounter during your playthrough and make allies with. This game was inspired a lot by the amazing game: LISA: The Painful and I would very much appreciate you to leave ideas, suggestions, bugs you found whilst playing, constructive criticism, etc. I am currently a 14 year old solo indie developer hoping to produce a commercial product. Thanks in advance.
